caption: After Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475–1564; born Caprese Michelangelo, Italy; died Rome, Italy), Roman Soldier in Three-Quarter-Length, from the Crucifixion of St. Peter, Pauline Chapel, the Vatican. Black chalk; 20.6 x 14.1 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1944-273)
